divs: Sighting DetailsOn my front landing of house smoking cigarette. Looking at stars and saw it change direction. Thought it was a star but knew it wasn't when it accelerated and moved in numerous directions..went in house to grab cell phone but when I tried taking video I could notsee on screen. The object then just disappeared
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Egg Harbor Township
There were no other sightings in Egg Harbor Township on or around August 15th 2012
Summary: was looking in sky at stars smoking and saw object moving in every direction
